title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 456.7 - Revocation and suspension
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 456.7 - Revocation and suspension

State Regulations

The commissioner may suspend or revoke a snowmobile
operator's safety certificate upon a determination by him that such action is
warranted, provided the certificate holder is given the opportunity of a
hearing before the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
456.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
